title: Maren Morris In-Studio with her Special Guest!  + Laura Linney on Playing ‘Wendy’ on Netflix's Ozark + The Cast Battles to Beat Eddie in Easy Trivia!
itunes:title: Maren Morris In-Studio with her Special Guest!  + Laura Linney on Playing ‘Wendy’ on Netflix's Ozark + The Cast Battles to Beat Eddie in Easy Trivia!
description:
Maren Morris stops by the studio to talk about her song “Circles Around This Town” and brings a special guest to help her with the performance. She also talks about the last time she was nervous and the meaning behind the title of her new album “Humble Quest”. Bobby talks to Laura Linney who plays Wendy Byrde on Ozark. They talk about what it’s like filming and how she differs from her character in real life. **Spoiler Warning*** Later in the interview, they discuss plot points if you’re not caught up to Season 4 of Ozark. We play a round of Easy Trivia where the new goal has become to BEAT Eddie!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
